text: Boola; â€œNikali mbu Bapapa benyu Abana benyu nende Abakhasi benyu nende Abekho benyu nende emiandu echiamwachuma nende tsinganga etsia muritsanga okhubiyilwa, nende tsinzu tsiamwachama, niebilayimunokhwinywe okhushila Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, nende okhulwanila idini yiyie, mana nakhalinde okhula Nyasaye arere likhuwa lilie, ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu ababii tawe
